alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 9:55PM CST until March 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. Higher amounts toward Grant County and southern Clayton County. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Richland, Crawford and Grant Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you are traveling late tonight or Monday morning, be prepared for snow covered roads in the advisory area. The morning commute will be impacted. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
